entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
